name: Old Historic Creole Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for a week and didn't want to leave! We've been to nola several times and have always stayed in one of the big hotels. I wanted, however, to try something more authentic to New Orleans and convinced my husband to give it a try. Glenn and Diana Smith, the new innkeepers, were terrific and the inn is better than we anticipated. The beds in our suite were so comfortable we didn't want to get up. The free use of the computer was particularly helpful to us. We had everything we needed. There was fresh fruit and other goodies daily, a refridgerator outside our door for our use, and a lovely patio area in the back.
reviews.title: Clean, charming and affordable!

reviews.text: The location is safe, the neighborhood charming and we never had a problem finding a parking spot on the street.
reviews.title: A great little B&B
Charming place
reviews.text: Diana works tirelessly keeping it clean and comfortable. When I mentioned to Diana that it was my husband's birthday, when we got back from dinner a b'day card was waiting for him! And be sure to follow her restaurant recomendations!

aka: Old Historic Creole Hotel New Orleans
